sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './sidebar.css' import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' export default function Sidebar() { const [cats, setCats] = useStats([]) useEffect(() => { const getCats = async () => { const res = await axios.get('/categories') setCats(res.data) } getCats() }, []) return (
ABOUT ME

Lorem ipsum, dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Quia, nisi. Ea harum qui assumenda earum.

CATEGORIES
    {cats.map((c) => (
  • {cats.name}
    • ))}
FOLLOW US
) }
